title: Electro Action Music Vol.1
description: Futuristic action loops and songs perfect for any modern or sci fi themed game.
longDescription:
Listen/watch:

https://soundcloud.com/405musicla/sets/electro-action-unreal/s-skUJK

Â 

This pack contains multiple genres of highly polished music beds, each aimed at futuristic and technology driven games. Every feature track is each broken down into multiple detailed loops, each with varying levels of intensity. This level of value ensures that you will always have the right sound for the job, whether its that tension filled moment right before the fight, or the bullets are flying and you are already neck deep in bodies! Overall, this pack is as versatile as it is exciting so there is plenty of content perfect for environments, menus, racing, cut scenes, on top of all out war. Come pick up this pack and ensure your next futuristic action game stands out from the rest.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 97

Number of Audio Cues: 97

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music\audio loop: Yes (62 of the audio tracks are loops)

How many minutes of audio provided: 107

Engine Compatibility: Unreal 4.19


6 Environment and menu music songs


11 Action songs with 4+ looping levels of intensity for each


Artwork by: www.andrewlimdesign.com
